title: Low Priority 20 minutes!
body:
Seriously this is like my 5th time having to wait 20minutes. there is no indicator that says how many i have left . I originally submitted a bug regarding crashing errors before I was place in low priority. 

Does the Arma 5v5 count toward low priority to get out of it? 

Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Aram's should be counting towards LPQ's as long as you're in them from start to finish without being marked as afk!

I am in it from start to finish. I've completed like 4 of them and I'm still in Low Priority waiting 20minutes each time.

I think this is slightly over kill. I reported a bug as to why my game was crashing. How many more 20 minute penalties do have to sit through?

Ahhhh so you were just confused as to how many LPQ games you had left is all. Anytime you get an LPQ, it's there for a certain amount of games. It actually looks like you've already finished all of them up by now.


PS We read through all of these, of course. You just happened to respond while I wasn't at work. Even poros gotta sleep ^_^

Daily bump,

I'm guessing Riot doesn't review this section.
